name: Simple Defender
description:
(web version is still 3.2 -> old)

Simple Tower Defense Game with:

  • 6 Towers (20 levels per tower)
  • 20 Levels
  • 4 Enemys (3 tiers each) + 2 Bosses
  • Simple Graphics

coming next:

  • ! -> unbuggy web version
  • android version -> better mobile control
  • ?linux (i make, if somebody want ;)
  • ?ios (i make, if somebody want ;)
  • more enemys
  • more levels
  • and later more towers (next one : plasma)
  • flying enemys

If you have and Idea or an wish (or found a bug) -> discussion or mail:
